channel.title: DUO+particle troubles and 2 links that helped
channel.description:
I got my red bear duo from the recent mass drop. Initially I was able to get the duo connected to particle build, but after trying to install an example application it stopped working. After a ton of random flashing I have things working again. Two pages helped get things going again.
https://github.com/redbear/firmware/releases https://community.particle.io/t/duo-wifi-will-not-connect/30081/15
The first link has information about flashing to the duo, and the second was used when the firmware was updated, but the device still wasn't connecting to particle build.
Hope this helps others.

item.title: DUO+particle troubles and 2 links that helped
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
Super helpful, @froismo - thanks so much

Read full topic

item.title: DUO+particle troubles and 2 links that helped
item.dc:creator: froismo
item.description:
I got my red bear duo from the recent mass drop. Initially I was able to get the duo connected to particle build, but after trying to install an example application it stopped working. After a ton of random flashing I have things working again. Two pages helped get things going again.

GitHub

Releases · redbear/firmware

Firmware for Particle Devices: Spark Core (master branch) and Photon (latest branch) - redbear/firmware

Particle – 2 Mar 17

Duo WiFi will not connect

Troubleshooting

For such issue I’d usually expect a rapid cyan blink with a short red burst in between, but you can try this anyway while in DFU Mode particle keys server particle keys doctor

The first link has information about flashing to the duo, and the second was used when the firmware was updated, but the device still wasn’t connecting to particle build.

Hope this helps others.

Read full topic
